about_the_game:
Package contains the full original soundtrack for Far from Noise, written by Geoff Lentin for the game.

Contains 13 original pieces of music including album artwork.

Tracklist:
1 Trailer
2 Love / Life
3 Perhaps
4 The Predicament
5 Nature
6 Alone
7 On Endless Days
8 Marine Biologist
9 Film
10 Architecture
11 Owl
12 Storm
13 Choice

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X v10.7 Lion or higher
  • Processor: 1.80GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with 512MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
